item.title: Trump says he will replace FBI Director Wray with loyalist Kash Patel
item.description: Trump picked Christopher Wray to lead the FBI in 2017, then soured on him before leaving office. Trump would have to fire Wray — or Wray would have to...

item.title: Tracking Trump’s picks for his Cabinet and administration
item.description: Here are the people Donald Trump has picked or is considering to fill his Cabinet and key positions in his administration.

item.title: Trump taps Florida sheriff as DEA administrator
item.description: The change in DEA leadership comes as the agency — and the nation — is still grappling with a drug crisis fueled by the flow of illicit fentanyl.

item.title: Who is Kash Patel, Trump’s pick to replace FBI director Chris Wray?
